{
    "_id": "10009999",
    "listing_url": "https://www.airbnb.com/rooms/10009999",
    "name": "Horto flat with small garden",
    "summary": "One bedroom + sofa-bed in quiet and bucolic neighbourhood right next to the Botanical Garden. Small garden, outside shower, well equipped kitchen and bathroom with shower and tub. Easy for transport with many restaurants and basic facilities in the area.",
    "space": "Lovely one bedroom + sofa-bed in the living room, perfect for two but fits up to four comfortably.  There´s a small outside garden with a shower There´s a well equipped open kitchen with both 110V / 220V wall plugs and one bathroom with shower, tub and even a sauna machine! All newly refurbished!",
    "description": "One bedroom + sofa-bed in quiet and bucolic neighbourhood right next to the Botanical Garden. Small garden, outside shower, well equipped kitchen and bathroom with shower and tub. Easy for transport with many restaurants and basic facilities in the area. Lovely one bedroom + sofa-bed in the living room, perfect for two but fits up to four comfortably.  There´s a small outside garden with a shower There´s a well equipped open kitchen with both 110V / 220V wall plugs and one bathroom with shower, tub and even a sauna machine! All newly refurbished! I´ll be happy to help you with any doubts, tips or any other information needed during your stay. This charming ground floor flat is located in Horto, a quiet and bucolic neighborhood just next to the Botanical Garden, where most of the descendants of it´s first gardeners still live. You´ll be 30 minutes walk from waterfalls in the rainforest with easy hiking trails! There are nice bars and restaurants as well as basic facilities - pharmacy, b",

            {
                "_id": "77162781",
                "date": "2016-05-30T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "12234922",
                "reviewer_id": "48665993",
                "reviewer_name": "Claudio",
                "comments": "The host canceled this reservation 76 days before arrival. This is an automated posting."
            },
            {
                "_id": "81628370",
                "date": "2016-06-24T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "12234922",
                "reviewer_id": "37515447",
                "reviewer_name": "Vania",
                "comments": "I had a great time with Ida, she is a lovely host and the room was nice, quiet, very clean and cozy. The location is also great and the view, wow! Amazing! I recommend staying with Ida at anytime."
            },
            {
                "_id": "92172021",
                "date": "2016-08-07T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "12234922",
                "reviewer_id": "75171260",
                "reviewer_name": "Nicole",
                "comments": "A estadia no apartamento da Ida foi ótima. Ela literalmente nos recebeu de braços abertos. Sempre muito atenciosa e solícita. O apartamento é muito bonito, limpo e a vista então nem se fala. Super recomendo!!!!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "92533640",
                "date": "2016-08-09T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "12234922",
                "reviewer_id": "24216725",
                "reviewer_name": "Clarice",
                "comments": "O que dizer sobre minha experiência nesse apartamento? Foi incrível! A Ida é uma pessoa adorável, muito simpática e prestativa. O apartamento é enorme e a vista é linda. O quarto é muito confortável, com ar condicionado e uma cama muito boa. O banheiro é bem espaçoso, com ducha, com toalhas limpinhas, shampoo, condicionador, sabonetes novinhos, tudo perfeito para aquele banho relaxante. Todos os ambientes têm uma limpeza impecável. A localização é privilegiada, em lugar tranquilo. Não há barulho. A anfitriã nos fez sentir bem vindos, e nos deu toda a privacidade necessária. Eu simplesmente poderia morar ali pelo resto da minha vida. Meu marido e eu fomos muito bem tratados, e servidos com um bolo de laranja delicioso.\nVoltarei mais vezes, e indicarei sempre."
            },
            {

                "reviewer_id": "101625019",
                "reviewer_name": "Carolina",
                "comments": "O apartamento é grande, com decoração de bom gosto, uma vista incrível da baía de Guanabara e fica muito bem localizado no bairro de Botafogo, muito próximo a UFRJ, cheguei a caminhar até a praia de Ipanema em um dia de energia mas indo de bicicleta(todo caminho tem ciclofaixa e estações do Rio Bike) levava cerca de 30min apenas.                 "comments": "Everything wrote in the previous reviews is true.. the best place I have ever stayed in terms of location and host!\nTo add: mattress really comfy, cats are gone, nice beach closeby, walkable in 15 min (Praia Vermelha)\n\nBecause of a missing vaccine I was forced to stay longer, no problem for Ida.             },

                "listing_id": "13242217",
                "reviewer_id": "9866897",
                "reviewer_name": "Jianwei",
                "comments": "Very well maintained place. In the middle of soho. Only downside is the number of steps to get to the apartment, but that's the same for most apartments on HK island. Great value, will stay again. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "164025660",
                "date": "2017-06-26T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "13242217",
                "reviewer_id": "80624707",
                "reviewer_name": "Jingjing",
                "comments": "Daniel's place is located in Central Hong Kong, close to restaurants, shops and bars. The flat is spacious and comfortable! I highly recommend it for your stay in HK!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "166287342",
                "date": "2017-07-03T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "13242217",
                "reviewer_id": "30849127",
                "reviewer_name": "Justin",
                "comments": "Fantastic place with a great location. The unit is located right between Sheung Wan and SoHo with a number of good restaurants on the same street.\nIf you're new to the island or want easy, walkable access to the area around Central, then I highly recommend this place.  "
            },
            {
                "_id": "221292200",
                "date": "2017-12-26T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "13242217",
                "reviewer_id": "158239126",
                "reviewer_name": "Salomon",
                "comments": "Besides the myriad of stairs and steps, the apartment is located within a walking distance to both sights and shopping, as well as to the Central subway station that connects a handful of lines. \n\nThe apartment was quite big by Hong Kong standards, and everything was clean and tidy on top of that. The stay went smoothly without any problems."
            },
            {
                "_id": "223910275",
                "date": "2018-01-02T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "13242217",
                "reviewer_id": "9893361",
                "reviewer_name": "Freyja",
                "comments": "Highly recommend!!\n\nDaniel was great at communicating and gave us lots of tips before we arrived.\n\nArriving was very straight forward (although it was surprising when the Doorman asked for our passport!) Daniel very kindly let us check in early - what a star!\n\nThe place is spacious (for Hong Kong), though if you're planning on cooking you'll likely have to spread out into the living room. Bed is comfy, shower is hot - what more could you want :)\n\nIf you don't mind walking up lots of steps and steep hills, you can easily see many of the main HK Island sights on foot. If walking isn't your thing, there's plenty of public transport options reasonably close.\n\nThis place is really slap bang in the middle of things - close to restaurants, bars, cafes, supermarkets, shopping centres.\n\nIt's a great place to base yourself, particularly if you're only there for a short trip, like were.\n\nWarning though: the area is very steep! You'll feel it in your calves :)"
            },
            {
                "_id": "298879881",
                "date": "2018-07-30T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "13242217",
                "reviewer_id": "2714512",
                "reviewer_name": "Kiran",
                "comments": "Great place to stay if you are visiting Hong Kong. Very close to restaurants and night life. Would highly recommend and would stay again if back in the area."
            },
            {
                "_id": "364065878",
                "date": "2018-12-30T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "13242217",
                "reviewer_id": "91018339",
                "reviewer_name": "Dandelion",
                "comments": "This modern apartment is located between Sheng Wan MTR & Central MTR. PMQ mall is across the street & visible through the window. Lots of food & drinks nearby, Lan Kwai Fong included (10 min walk). \n\nAlthough conveniently located, it is quiet as party-goers are found wandering in the streets starting one block away. For a straight-shot to the Sheng Wan station, take a couple long flights of stairs. If you have luggage & want to avoid that, use the Central station (or Uber) but keep in mind it is always very crowded there. \n\nApartment was spacious for Hong Kong standards. Shower pressure was strong & stayed hot through long hair washing. Living room has surround sound system & English channels to watch TV. There's an extra closet room for hanging clothes. \n\nOverall, great place to stay as compared to other HK apartments. \n\nAlso note, not all amenities at Dan's place are for communal use. This was not listed under House Rules nor noted anywhere. I was surprised to receive a note after check-out that an already open beverage was not for share although fridge was listed as an amenity. Through dozens of stays on Airbnb, this was my first experience encountering such an issue. Just use caution here."
            },
            {
                "_id": "366627016",
                "date": "2019-01-03T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "13242217",
                "reviewer_id": "47208441",
                "reviewer_name": "Tom",
                "comments": "Perfect place in the middle of Hong Kong to explore the city!"
            }
        ]
    },

            {
                "_id": "355284",
                "date": "2011-07-05T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "132695",
                "reviewer_id": "745535",
                "reviewer_name": "Benjamin",
                "comments": "Our stay at Holly's apartment was perfect. The apartment was clean and very well prepared for our arrival. We certainly felt like welcome guests. She was pleasant to communicate with and also very helpful. The location of the apartment was great, and we would certainly recommend her and the apartment to anyone visiting NYC. Thanks!\r\n"
            },
            {
                "_id": "390655",
                "date": "2011-07-23T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "132695",
                "reviewer_id": "652664",
                "reviewer_name": "Laura",
                "comments": "Holly and Grayson were just great. It was our first time doing this and I can only say good, great things about both of them and the apartment. It was like going to the best hotel in NY with all the good things of having an apartment for yourself. They were very considerate and the flat was really clean and with all the little details you could ask for. They are really nice people and Holly and I have been talking by e-mail before a lot so everything was easy and nice once we get there; She is so sweet, she gave us the best guide for the neighborhood to make us feel at home. If we go back to NYC we'll definetely count on them. I don't want to lose contact because they are people worth meeting and knowing.  "
            },
            {
                "_id": "659501",
                "date": "2011-10-24T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "132695",
                "reviewer_id": "1243271",
                "reviewer_name": "Mallory",
                "comments": "Hollis and Grayson were the perfect hosts!  They made up the air mattress for us, left us clean sheets and towels, sent us a great guide to the area, and even left us some delicious coffee.  Their apartment is adorable and in a great area of Brooklyn, but also right on the subway line making it easy to get to Manhattan.  Hollis was great with communication, and made our first airbnb experience stress-free and awesome. Definitely recommended!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "677264",
                "date": "2011-10-31T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "132695",
                "reviewer_id": "1233216",
                "reviewer_name": "Lauren",
                "comments": "The host canceled my reservation 22 days before arrival."
            },
            {
                "_id": "822890",
                "date": "2012-01-02T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "132695",
                "reviewer_id": "1281757",
                "reviewer_name": "Olivia",
                "comments": "We had already been to New York before (in different hotels and hostels), but this was definitely our best accomodation! \r\nThe apartment is located in a nice, quiet neighbourhood, very close to Manhattan, but interesting in itself (with cafés, shops, etc., at a stone's throw). It's not as small as we thought it would be, and it fitted us four with no problem whatsoever. It's full of books, so you could spend numerous rainy days there without getting bored - but the sun shone almost the whole time we were there. \r\nAlthough we had some trouble finding (and giving back) the keys, it was all settled with a phone call (Holly was easily reachable, even early morning on Jan. 1!), and all was well that ended well. We would definitely recommand the place, our only regret being not to have met their owners!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "1113082",
                "date": "2012-04-12T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "132695",
                "reviewer_id": "1805133",
                "reviewer_name": "Judith",
                "comments": "We felt at home from the moment we stepped inside the apartment. There even was a bottle of wine and two glasses waiting for us on the table! The communication with Holly was very easy and she made the whole process of setting the details quite smooth. The fact that she and her boyfriend made themselves available to reach by phone at any time was reassuring, especially for newcomers on airbnb. \r\nThe apartment was really nice, conveniently located near a subway station going to Manhattan or some main streets in Williamsburg, so visiting the neighbourhood was easy. The guest guide Holly provided us was helpful, especially for the restaurants list. The café Lula Bean, next to the apartment, was a good stop for early (and not so early) starts, and we became \"regulars\" for the few days we were there.\r\nI would strongly recommend Holly's place!\r\n"
            },
            {
                "_id": "4035408",
                "date": "2013-04-04T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "132695",
                "reviewer_id": "5310520",
                "reviewer_name": "Chris",
                "comments": "Our stay at Chez Grollis was fantastic! From my first contact with Hollis to checkout on the last day, she was quick to respond  by both email & text and was super helpful. She prearranged a friend to meet us for the key exchange at checkin as they were already out of town, and even sent us an awesome neighbourhood guide days before our arrival. \n\n A 2 minute walk to the 'L' train, and minutes away from some great restaurants and bars, this apartment was perfect for our group of three.  Grocery options were also close by, and McCarren Park is nearby for anyone looking to get some exercise in.  The neighbourhood is safe and we did not feel uncomfortable taking the train or walking the area at night. \n\nMet Hollis & Grayson on the last day to exchange keys  as previously arranged and was happy to meet & thank these polite and helpful hosts  in person for a fantastic stay. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "6026205",
                "date": "2013-07-27T04:00:00.000Z",

            },
            {

                "date": "2015-05-12T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "132695",
                "reviewer_id": "32597055",
                "reviewer_name": "Ben",
                "comments": "i had a great stay at hollis and grayson's place. it is conveniently located for me, as most of my brooklyn comrades live walking distance from the apartment. the L train is right on the corner, and the nearby stores/restaurants/bars are great. the apartment has a good kitchen, and the shower has really good water pressure. there is a dry cleaner immediately next door to the building, and a laundromat across the street, which was quite handy. could not have asked for better accommodation. thank you."

                "date": "2016-08-08T04:00:00.000Z",

                "reviewer_name": "Bec And Sam",
                "comments": "It was lovely to meet Jessica, she was an amazing host! The apartment was clean and comfortable. Jessica was very friendly and helpful and we're definitely planning on staying here again next time we're in Sydney!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "95316651",
                "date": "2016-08-19T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "13320545",
                "reviewer_id": "10592576",
                "reviewer_name": "Stacey",
                "comments": "Jessica is a genuinely kind hearted person. She made me and my boyfriend feel welcome and helped us in the ways that she could. I've been in many a Airbnb, and I definitely recommend Jessica and her flat!"
            },

            {
                "_id": "140791623",
                "date": "2017-03-31T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "13320545",
                "reviewer_id": "37740484",
                "reviewer_name": "榛嫈",
                "comments": "1.房間無對外窗有點悶熱,跟房東借電風扇有所改善,但夏季可能會非常熱\n2.有天窗可以引進自然光,因此白天光線很好,當然也不可能睡太晚｡\n3.因為直接睡在房東原本的房間,因此房東會睡在客廳的沙發,所謂會提供的洗衣機等配備都不方便使用,連晚上上廁所都要擔心吵到房東｡\n4.wifi連線很順暢\n5.住宿的幾天附近都有人在施工,因此有點吵｡\n6.餐廳有貓飼料等,因此有蠻明顯的貓味道｡\n7.距離paddington Saturday market很近\n8.房間衣櫃不能使用,且空間小,行李箱一打開就沒有空間可行走\n9.有蟑螂"
            },

            {

                "listing_id": "13320545",
                "reviewer_id": "5697153",
                "reviewer_name": "Nadia",
                "comments": "\nJessica was a lovely host! Despite her being unwell while I stayed there I could always rely on her to help me out with anything around the flat, awesome restaurant and sightseeing recommendations and just generally pleasant company :) The cats were lovely and very affectionate. I definitely felt at home at Jessica's flat. Extremely well located for buses to take you to either Bondi or central Sydney, as it's basically halfway in between. I walked to Mrs McQuarries point one day and it took just over an hour to do so, buses take 10-15 minutes to central. Paddington itself is a cute neighbourhood with some nice places to eat/drink/shop nearby. Quite a few steps to take up to the flat just for anyone who might have issues with that, I didn't. Really enjoyed my stay at Jessica's flat highly recommend it! "
            },

                "comments": "Jessica very kindly accepted our last minute booking - she was very welcoming and her flat is a lovely little place tucked away in Paddington, which has some greats shops and bars and a market and is very well-connected with the CBD.\nHowever, we did have some trouble sleeping due to construction noise and paint smells coming through the floorboards, as there was a shop being fitted on the floor below.             {
                "_id": "105635584",
                "date": "2016-10-02T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "14649808",
                "reviewer_id": "7070455",
                "reviewer_name": "Jb",
                "comments": "Raed\"s flat is perfect for a stay in Montreal (I spent 1 week in there). Very clean, all equipments required, big bath + shower, very central location. Very nice shared terrace on the roof. I also rented a bicycle and their a safe place to park it. \nWhen so I haven't met Raed during my trip, as he was abroad, he was very welcoming and read to provide help and tips when required. I can then strongly recommend Raed's place."
            },
            {
                "_id": "109140280",
                "date": "2016-10-19T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "14649808",
                "reviewer_id": "23941816",
                "reviewer_name": "Jeremy",
                "comments": "Apartment is in a fantastic area, two seconds to the Metro, walkable t o the plateau and downtown. Bixi bike stop right beside the Metro as well.\r\nI was extended for work and there were literally no hotel rooms that met my work cost guidelines. Raed's apartment was cheaper and infinitely better than the room I was staying at and was closer to the metro too.\r\n\r\nRaed made check in a breeze and worked with me when my plans changed for checkout. He was available via text and phone and helped me all the way through.\r\n\r\nNext time I'm in Montreal, this will be my first choice for accommodation."
            },
            {
                "_id": "110162281",
                "date": "2016-10-24T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "14649808",
                "reviewer_id": "27422351",
                "reviewer_name": "Louis",
                "comments": "Logement fantastique! Il est situé en plein cœur du Quartier des spectacles, très sécuritaire et lumineux. L'hôte Raed a été très facile à joindre, prévenant et attentionné. Une perle."
            },
            {
                "_id": "128420751",
                "date": "2017-01-24T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "14649808",
                "reviewer_id": "16349684",
                "reviewer_name": "Ar",
                "comments": "The apartment is in a great location and Raed was an accommodating host. Great place to stay."
            },
            {
                "_id": "161084562",
                "date": "2017-06-16T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "14649808",
                "reviewer_id": "699595",
                "reviewer_name": "Woody",
                "comments": "This is a great apartment and Raed is a very nice and accommodating host. However, I had a couple issues with this trip. This is nothing against Raed or his place. Both the apartment and the host are great. Just a few logistical, subjective-comfort, and communication related things. \n\nWhen asking Raed about potential noise in the apartment, before I booked, he said \"this is all very subjective... it should be fine.\" When I got to the apartment, there was major construction (which begins at around (8-9AM) surrounding the apartment (the apartment is on a right angle on a major intersection near Place de Arts) and the music from nearby festivals (very loud) begins in the afternoon and ends late at night at around 11PM-12AM. \n\nI was aware of how close the festivals were, but based on Raed's comment, I figured it would be relatively quiet and didn't anticipate such loud music and construction. I was a bit annoyed when I got to the apartment and for the first few days, I was bombarded with construction early in the morning and then blaring music for most of the day. This may have been miscommunication, or maybe it is a new issue, but I felt somewhat misled. Now this might not bother anyone else, which is fine. But I did ask about the noise level before I booked. And yet, the experience I had wound up contradicting what I had been told by the host. So make sure you ask specific questions if you have specific concerns. And if you are looking for quiet during the day — good luck!\n\nThere was also some initial confusion when trying to book the apartment because the dates that were listed as available were not actually all available. In fact, I had to change my reservation from June 12-26 to June 12-20 because Raed had his own plans with the apartment from the 20th onward but this was not reflected on AirBnB and it wasn’t until after I booked my dates that I found out the the apartment wouldn’t be available after the 20th. This lack of clarity in communication was pretty inconvenient for me. Plus, I had to wait to hear back from and constantly inquire with Raed when trying to find out the actual available dates to see if the apartment was going to be available or not. Even after I booked, the dates listed as available remained inaccurate. If I didn't keep contacting him, I'm not sure how things would have turned out. This put a some stress on my travel plans, which were admittedly very last minute. I realize Raed was probably very busy, but it's always the little, logistical things that matter.\n\nDespite these relatively minor issues, I must state that Raed was very accommodating and responsive during my actual trip, very friendly, and in the end - he was very considerate by allowing me to check out a few days early.\n\nGreat apartment. Great host."
            },
            {
                "_id": "179451880",
                "date": "2017-08-07T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "14649808",
                "reviewer_id": "34507884",

                "comments": "The place is ideally located right on the Place des Arts and the flat itself is very enjoyable to live in. And above all, Raed is an extremely kind and attentive host. Overall, I very highly recommend both the flat and its host. Definitely my go-to place for my future journeys in Montreal."
            },

            {
                "_id": "188791880",
                "date": "2017-08-30T04:00:00.000Z",

                "reviewer_id": "146005202",
                "reviewer_name": "Connie",
                "comments": "The apartment is as appears on the picture. Clean, cosy, and with a  pleasant ambience and all basic facilities such as towels, kettle, toaster, iron, etc There's a coffee place downstairs, metro right opposite, grocery store 5 minutes away and within easy walking reach to the heart of downtown Montreal and Mcgill university. I would definitely recommend it to friends and will look out for it on my next visit."
            },
            {

            },
            {

                "reviewer_id": "5259377",
                "reviewer_name": "Janice",
                "comments": "This was a beautiful stay, much appreciated.  Raed and Hidaya were accommodating in every way, kind, generous, and flexible. There wasn't a single thing that could be improved upon.  Special thanks to Raed and Hidaya for being such great people."
            },
            {

            {
                "_id": "285719704",

            {
                "_id": "307513625",
                "date": "2018-08-14T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "14649808",
                "reviewer_id": "16445459",
                "reviewer_name": "Christopher",
                "comments": "The location is phenomenal.  You could honestly park your car and toss your transportation passes.  This place is close to everything.  The host was mostly responsive.  \n\nOnly issue I had was not having access to the rooftop for the entire 7 days I stayed.   The nice rooftop is included in the description for this place, so that was a major selling point for me to book the space, making it simply disappointing that I didn’t have access.  The host was not able to provide an answer on how to get acesss to the rooftop.   Finally, I booked the entire apartment, and it was listed as full apartment access.  The room you actually get is the smaller room with the bed that looks more slim and less comfortable.  I had a good rest in the room I slept in, but I assumed that having the apartment to myself would allow me to sleep in the nicer room that is actually pictured on the website.  Not sure why it is pictured if it is not available to potential guests.  \n\nOutside of those things, Raed was very quick to respond and good to work with.   \n\nI would return to this Airbnb, unless a place with proper rooftop access is available.  \n\nCheers"
            },

                "reviewer_id": "3689434",
                "reviewer_name": "Tal",
                "comments": "Great flat and building in a superb location! Soho and LKF's bars and restaurants are literally few steps away. I was Michelle's second guest so my checkin wasn't smooth but I'm sure this won't be an issue in the future. I highly recommend staying here to enjoy lovely HK."
            },
            {
                "_id": "123827351",
                "date": "2016-12-30T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "15182133",
                "reviewer_id": "54623582",
                "reviewer_name": "Jelmer",
                "comments": "Had a really pleasant stay at Michelles place. It was a big appartment for Hong Kong standards. The place was a 10min walk to LKF and Sheung Wan and Central station. The place was clean and had a nice little balcony to chill on. The instructions for the place and how to get there/inside were also clear. For any questions Michelle usually responded within 10 minutes, which was really useful."
            },
            {
                "_id": "124888871",
                "date": "2017-01-02T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "15182133",
                "reviewer_id": "103837637",
                "reviewer_name": "Carrie",
                "comments": "New and good quality apartment. Close to central. Cafe downstairs. Good for couple."
            },
            {
                "_id": "199793703",
                "date": "2017-10-03T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "15182133",
                "reviewer_id": "42276091",
                "reviewer_name": "Debbie",
                "comments": "Michelle was a great host. Although we never actually met she was easily contactable via (Hidden by Airbnb) or email and provided us with great instructions on how to check in. The flat was great and better than what we expected. It is in a great location right in the middle of the hustle and bustle of HK. Would definitely want to stay again in the future."
            },
            {
                "_id": "208099240",
                "date": "2017-10-31T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "15182133",
                "reviewer_id": "17856735",
                "reviewer_name": "Loretta",
                "comments": "Michelle’s is in a great location. Can get to MTR in just over 5 minutes. Can use the gym in the build for small charge per day. Michelle is very quick to respond if there are any questions or problems. Close to bars and restaurants but not noisy at all."
            },
            {
                "_id": "220792111",
                "date": "2017-12-24T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "15182133",
                "reviewer_id": "10158865",
                "reviewer_name": "Nathan",
                "comments": "Extremely convenient location within walking distance to MTR and LKF. This is still my favourite building to stay in in Hong Kong and would highly recommend.\n\nMichelle is a great host that is extremely easy to communicate with. \n\nOverall would recommend staying here!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "259415379",
                "date": "2018-05-01T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "15182133",
                "reviewer_id": "185503732",
                "reviewer_name": "Jay Kyun",
                "comments": "Perfect location, if you are thinking of staying in Central Area. Walkable from Hong Kong Station, where you get off from Airport Express, Central Station, and Sheung Wan Station; Sheung Wan station is the closest, if you are willing to climb up stairs. Perfect location and a host that is willing to help you out. Just a great place for a short vacation in HK."
            },
            {

                "reviewer_id": "217754535",
                "reviewer_name": "Antonia",
                "comments": "Michelle was great and provided prompt responses when I needed to contact her for questions and problems.   Her check in  instructions was very clear and flexible.  The unit is in a great location, can easily get to MTR, close to bars and restaurants within minutes."

        "summary": "Excelente localização na Rua Nascimento Silva entre Farme de Amoedo e Vinicius de Moraes no coração de Ipanema. Diversas opções de restaurantes, lojas, academias, supermercado 24hs, a algumas quadras do Posto 9 da Praia de Ipanema e da famosa Lagoa Rodrigo de Freitas.",
        "space": "Apartamento silencioso e próximo a transportes para qualquer ponto da cidade como metrô, taxi e ônibus a duas quadras do apartamento.         "neighborhood_overview": "Ipanema é um dos bairros do Rio de Janeiro mais conhecido e frequentado da cidade. O estilo de vida em Ipanema é leve e boêmio, os bares vivem cheios e as pessoas abandonam as calças jeans para aderirem roupas mais confortáveis e frescas.",
        "notes": "",
        "transit": "A bela e encantadora Praia de Ipanema ficou mundialmente famosa depois de inspirar o compositor Vinícius de Morais na música Garota de Ipanema. O lugar é frequentado dia e noite por turistas e moradores que vão caminhar, praticar esportes, bater papo, andar de bicicleta na ciclovia, tomar água de coco nos quiosques ou apenas apreciar a beleza da praia. O Posto Nove de Ipanema se tornou um ponto de encontro e também um dos melhores pontos da praia carioca, sendo bastante frequentado por jovens e celebridades. A Pedra do Arpoador é um grande ponto turístico que também faz parte da Praia de Ipanema. O lugar tem costume de atrair pessoas para assistir ao pôr do sol.",

                "reviewer_name": "Daniel",
                "comments": "This place is absolutely AMAZING!! Kiki and her brother are wonderful people and very easy going. The room with private toilet feels very private and the also has A/C.                 "_id": "224872985",

                "reviewer_id": "151217726",
                "reviewer_name": "Anna",
                "comments": "The 8-day stay at Kiki's was super pleasant. She is very friendly, obliging and incredibly helpful. Whenever me and my boyfriend had any inquiries or needed any help she was more than happy to. \nThe apartment was very clean, had several possibilities to store our stuff and was very comfortable, which made us feel at home from the very beginning.\nThere's a bathroom bordering the room which was very convenient, only the shower had to be shared, but that was no problem as she is very tidy.\nBy taking the train (145th st) from the station just around the corner from the apartment you could get to pretty much anywhere in and around Manhattan. \nWhen we got the news that our flight had been canceled and we were told we would have to stay another night Kiki offered us to stay another night right away.\nWe highly recommend staying here and would come back any time."
            },

                "reviewer_id": "63402068",
                "reviewer_name": "Ana",
                "comments": "Kiki's place was perfect for my husband and I! \n\nThe room and shared shower were very clean and the bed was very comfortable!\nOur room had a half bathroom (toilet only).\n\nThe location was less than 5 minutes away from the subway. L'appartamento é molto caldo (era un gelido dicembre) in ogni senso, non ha l'anonimità di appartamenti appena ristrutturati per essere affittati. E' molto vicino ad Istikal, é ben servito dai mezzi, ha negozi di quartiere tipicamente Istambulioti. Ottimo wifi e cucina molto attrezzata."
            },

            {
                "_id": "176561928",
                "date": "2017-07-31T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "2023934",
                "reviewer_id": "41441847",
                "reviewer_name": "Kornelia",
                "comments": "Place absolutety amazing place I've spend 8 nights and what I was looking for. Felt like home. The flat is cosy, with big beautful windows and cute balcony for morning coffee! Downstars you have small and cute street with everything you need: grocery with fresh fruits and vegetables, bakery (the best ever) and even small wine shop. 5 mins away from the biggest shopping street and all small streets with pubs and cafes (Taksim area). Perfect place to stay in Istanbul, quiet. Highly recommended."
            },
            {
                "_id": "181183138",
                "date": "2017-08-12T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "2023934",
                "reviewer_id": "37305871",
                "reviewer_name": "Caleb",
                "comments": "I decided to book an apartment for my two-weeks-stay in Istanbul, which seemed a better alternative to staying at a hotel or hostel. I initially chose this place because of the good location, reasonable price, and altogether excellent reviews. The location is indeed good, but everything from the first communications to checkout was extremely disappointing. For the checkin, the host told me I would meet one of his friends in Taksim. When I got there, I waited over half an hour, trying to reach the friend, until I called the host. He then told me to come straight to the apartment (rather than waiting for the friend at Taksim), which was another fifteen-minute walk away. I should mention that I've traveled to Istanbul before so I'm familiar with the area, but juggling my luggage and trying to find a route on my phone was quite a hassle. When I arrived, the host was brusque, unfriendly, and did not give me a chance to even survey the apartment. I would go on to discover that almost everything in the apartment was broken and covered in a noticeable layer of grime. The toilet cover was gone and the water wouldn't stop until I reached my hand in the back tank and pulled a lever; the pole holding up the shower head was snapped off; the kitchen sink effectively had two settings--steady drip and explosive deluge; the handles on the cupboards were broken; part of the floor was taped over; one of the stove tops was broken; and the washing machine door wouldn't close. Then there was the cleanliness issue: both the kitchen and bathroom sinks were constantly swarming with small flies, the shower was still covered in the last guest's hair, the utensils and other cooking materials were encrusted with old food, and the floor was coated in grime. I was barely able to stomach scrubbing and boiling the bare utensils I would need to survive, and I ate out as much as was feasible. The apartment also lacked toilet paper when I first arrived. The host did bring some over, but only a day after I contacted him about it. After a day or so of living there, I noticed that periodically a strong smell of sewage would permeate the entire room. Windows closed or opened, it was unavoidable. The host said he'd never had complaints of a bad smell before, but for me at least, it was impossible to miss. One day, the water was shut off--this was likely an issue for the entire neighborhood, but it's never happened to me during prior trips to Istanbul. Though it didn't bother me, potential guests should also be aware that you can hear EVERYTHING the people upstairs do. I seriously considered leaving the apartment early and finding another place to stay, but unfortunately this was not financially feasible. Lastly, I contacted the host more than 24 hours before I planned to move out to arrange where to leave the key and what..."
            },

                "comments": "The apartment is conveniently located a close walking distance to Taksim. It was simple and clean but there was an unpleasant smell of sewage coming from the kitchen.             {
                "_id": "290958518",

            {
                "_id": "293789038",
                "date": "2018-07-21T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "2023934",
                "reviewer_id": "17975848",
                "reviewer_name": "Sandy",
                "comments": "Overall a great place for the value. Close to shops, restaurants, and Istiklal street. It is a good 25 minute (with luggage) walk from either the Metro or where the Havabus shuttle drops you off. The flat also lacks A/C (I got used to it and the fan was invaluable) and it is about a three floor walk up, no television either, though you’ll be out exploring! The area is more residential, quiet and comfortable. The laundry is great to have and the space is quite large. The kitchen is adequate, I only cooked breakfasts there. A local doner shop is a MUST: Durumzade. (The Ulfa kabob platter is excellent.) Also try local Turkish wine and beer, good stuff! Once you purchase an Istanbulkart, the metro is easy and great for getting to all the top sights. (Highly recommend since Sultanahmet, Grand Bazaar, etc. is a good 45 minute walk, at least.) The cruise of the Bosphorus Straight is also a MUST. Only 24 lira and it was the highlight of my trip. The flat great space away from the hustle and bustle. "
            },

                "comments": "We enjoyed our stay in Hakans place. The apartment was clean and had everything we needed for a week stay. There are two rooms:one bedroom and a really big studio living room with couch, kitchen, and several tables to eat and to work. A gentle touch of old Istanbul houses was lovely. WiFi was good. Hot water was always there also. All the necessary dishes/bath towels/iron/hair dryer were there. The flat is situated on a calm street but still 5-7 mins walking to Istiklal street. Hakan was a nice host always online  and ready to help. Gladly will recommend his place."

                "_id": "224209281",
                "date": "2018-01-02T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "20588113",
                "reviewer_id": "64769605",
                "reviewer_name": "François",
                "comments": "Logerment idéalement situé dans le petit village de Pointe-Claire, pittoresque à souhait avec quelques maisons pluri-centenaires, ce qui est suffisamment rare en Amérique du Nord pour être mentionné. A l’étage d’une maison sans doute bien ancienne, dans une ruelle qui donne sur le fleuve, une grande chambre lumineuse, manifestement récemment mordernisée, avec un dressing et une salle de bain (Website hidden by Airbnb) d’une douche à l’italienne très spacieuse. À noter, un vaste lit - un vrai king size - très très confortable, on y passerait sa journée! L’hôte est une délicieuse dame d’origine hollandaise, installée au Canada depuis 1956, très amicale. Elle vit en compagnie d’un petit chat plein de poils, très timide, et d’une autre personne dont la chambre se situe à l’étage, comme notre logement, mais qui était absente pour les fêtes.\nAu total, entière satisfaction!"
            },

I went to bed early and got up and left on the morning of a big storm in Montreal, so unfortunately I did not get to say goodbye. Hoping to stay again when I next write an exam in Pointe-Claire.\n\nCheers,"

                "comments": "I enjoyed the hospitality at Jose's place very much.                 "comments": "We had a most wonderful stay with Jose!  The location of her home is right in the heart of the enchanted Pointe-Claire village:  the sprawling lake front is 2 mins down her street, and all the charming amenities of the main street are 2 mins up from her home.             {

                "listing_id": "20588113",
                "reviewer_id": "111910183",
                "reviewer_name": "Rose",
                "comments": "The house is cute and comfortable. The rooms are bright and the view of the neighborhood is quaint. The king size bed feels like a cloud, I haven’t been that comfy in I don’t know how long. The extra bed room is also cute and looks like if you are traveling with a child it would be perfect(even with out AC). The windows in the home are usually open letting in a very nice breeze off of the lake. The bathroom is aesthetically pleasing and very clean. The host (Jose)is very helpful and kind and informative. She has newspaper clips and brochures of things that are in the area and gave us tips on things to do. Her home is right at the shore and a windmill from 1709 so the walks always seem to have an amazing view, especially accompanied with some ice cream from a little shop around the corner from her place. The town seems to have a very safe feel, to the point that you could be comfortable sending your children out to play without worry. I would recommend this home and host to anyone. Definitely an experience I am glad I took the time for. "

            {
                "_id": "225264962",
                "date": "2018-01-06T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "21571388",
                "reviewer_id": "578182",
                "reviewer_name": "Bryan",
                "comments": "I stayed at Danny's place for a month. Danny was very helpful and quick to communicate. His place was in the exact location I was looking for during my stay. It was very convenient to walk around Wan Chai and Admiralty. Danny realized before I arrived that the bed size was slightly smaller than his listing originally mentioned and he let me know right away. The size was decent for HK apartment on Hong Kong island."
            },
            {
                "_id": "237709129",
                "date": "2018-02-24T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "21571388",
                "reviewer_id": "142725693",
                "reviewer_name": "Josh",
                "comments": "I stayed at Danny's apartment in Wanchai for a week while visiting family and sightseeing. His apartment was perfectly located for me. It was very close to the MTR station and near restaurants and shops. It was exactly as described and his directions got me there easily. Perfect location if you are visiting the Wanchai area! I did not personally meet Danny, but he was responsive and gave me all the info I needed. \n\nThanks, Danny!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "293731120",
                "date": "2018-07-21T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "21571388",
                "reviewer_id": "55973063",
                "reviewer_name": "Rachel",
                "comments": "Danny’s home in Wan Chai is awesome. It’s so close to everything. Five minutes from four different MTR stations which are all interconnected underground and the subway system is very accessible and easy to maneuver. Danny was an excellent host! He had his maid clean the place right before we arrived and each separate room in his place is equipped with a/c. The kitchen area is a little small maybe not intended for a long term stay of 6 weeks like ours was, but it’s Hong Kong and space is limited. Luckily Wan Chai is quite the gastronomic delight so we didn’t have a problem eating our meals out and finding new places all around the area to eat. Danny also gave us his personal recommendations which ended up being our favorite restaurants. I strongly recommend staying in Danny’s place if you want something clean, with a prime location and an attentive friendly host!"
            }
        ]
    },

                "comments": "Nalan's flat is quite big, well equipped and very well located in Moda. Nalan was easy to communicate with, friendly, precise and reliable. I very much enjoyed staying at her place (it's a real pleasure to get home after a busy day in Istanbul) and can only recommend her flat."
            },
            {
                "_id": "274477060",
                "date": "2018-06-09T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "140106743",
                "reviewer_name": "Tural",
                "comments": "Moda caddesinin en merkezi yerinde, sahile ve tüm cafe ve restoranlara yürüme mesafesinde bulunan bu güzel apartmanda konaklamak gerçekten çok güzeldi. Nalan hanımın ev sahipliğinden ise aşırı memnun kaldık. Ev çok güzel dekore edilmiş şık ve komforluydu, banyo ve tuvalet çok temiz, balkon ise çok kullanışlı. Bukadar merkezi bir lokasyonda böyle bir konaklamayı açıkça beklemiyorduk.  Birdahaki gelişimde de mutlaka burada konaklayacağım."
            },
            {
                "_id": "279621441",
                "date": "2018-06-21T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "66848248",
                "reviewer_name": "Mucahid",
                "comments": "The apartment is very comfortable and cozy, it has everything for a comfortable stay, for example dishes, towels, hair dryer, even drinking water. The apartment is located near the sea, also close to shops, restaurants, metro. The apartment is clean! Although the apartment was perfect, the owner of the apartment was interested in our comfort, she is very attentive and caring. If you appreciate comfort and convenience, this apartment will be the best option!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "288151853",
                "date": "2018-07-09T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "6630219",
                "reviewer_name": "David",
                "comments": "The location is super and the house is very clean. The communication was excellent."
            },
            {
                "_id": "297619399",
                "date": "2018-07-28T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "102218098",
                "reviewer_name": "Yasar Nuri",
                "comments": "The apartment was better than expected! It was stylishly furnished, tasteful and very clean.The balcony  large and comfortable, the kitchen well-equipped, All was spotlessly clean and the linens and towels generously supplied.\nThe host was so hospitable and thoughtful helped me whenever i contacted during my accomodation.\nI highly recommend the apartment for those who want to stay in Moda-Kadıkoy !\n"
            },
            {
                "_id": "301449053",
                "date": "2018-08-04T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "128482917",
                "reviewer_name": "Neil",
                "comments": "Great location nice place"
            },
            {
                "_id": "325639320",
                "date": "2018-09-20T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "36470301",
                "reviewer_name": "Munir",
                "comments": "A very nice apartment in a great location at Moda - one of the best neighborhoods on the Asian side of Istanbul.   Within easy walking distance of everything Kadikoy has the offer in terms of dining, shopping, transportation to other parts of Istanbul, and of course the lively bar scene.  Apartment was as described, comfortable, sparkling clean, and well appointed.  Everything worked well and we had no problems.  Nalan is a great host, she is responsive and easy to communicate with.  Highly recommend Nalan's place."
            },
            {
                "_id": "334498426",
                "date": "2018-10-09T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "48253104",
                "reviewer_name": "Jenneke",
                "comments": "Nalans place is lovely and stylish and at an excellent location. Everything you need is there. WiFi is working great. Nalan is very reachable and eager to help out if you have any questions. If there is one thing for improvement it’s the lighting situation, but every Turkish home I’ve stayed in has had the same: not many side lamps. I used the balcony a lot, it’s a nice place to feel you’re in the city. Next door is an excellent dürüm shop and all the treats of Kadiköy are within walking distance. In 10 minutes you walk to the Bosporus public transport to European side. Loved to stay here and hope to come back some time!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "342630511",
                "date": "2018-10-29T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "220531909",
                "reviewer_name": "Nicolas",
                "comments": "Great flat in a great location, own by a great owner!!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "347243479",
                "date": "2018-11-11T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "20997176",
                "reviewer_name": "Madhia",
                "comments": "Great location. \nPlenty of bars, restaurants and coffee shops.\nDurum Place next door"
            },
            {
                "_id": "349028092",
                "date": "2018-11-16T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "9860832",
                "reviewer_name": "Grace + David",
                "comments": "Nalan's place is what airbnb should be. She let me into her beautiful home with great amenities, perfect fast communication in a great location. Highly recommended."
            },
            {
                "_id": "352380889",
                "date": "2018-11-25T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "62153609",
                "reviewer_name": "Sibel",
                "comments": "Ben Londra/Ingiltere'de yasayan bir kisi olarak Turkiye'ye ziyaretlerimde rahat ve konforlu bir ortam bulmaya ozen gosteriyorum. Bunun icin de Nalan hanim'in evini herkese tavsiye ederim.  Nalan hanim kibar ve dusunceli bir kisi. Nalan hanim'in evi Moda'nin en guzel ve guvenli yerinde olup heryere ulasimi cok kolaydi. Ana caddede olmasina ragmen evin ici cok sessiz ve rahatti. Ozellikle de apartman ve apartmanin girisi cok guvenli olup istediginiz saatte gonul rahatligi ile eve gelmemi sagladi. Nalan hanim bana her turlu konforu sagladi. Ozellikle de Wi-fi mukemmel hizliydi.  Tabii ki Nalan hanimin mukemmel balkonu da evin en onemli ozelliklerinden biriydi. Nalan hanimin evini ve kendisinin gosterdigi misafirligi herkese gonulden tavsiye ederim. Kendi adima cok dogru bir tercih yaptigima inaniyor ve Turkiye'ye yapacagim ilerki ziyaretlerim de de Nalan hanimin evini tutmayi planliyorum. Tabii ki misafirligi icin de Nalan hanima cok teseekur ediyorum."
            },
            {
                "_id": "355864042",
                "date": "2018-12-06T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "62657436",
                "reviewer_name": "Julie",
                "comments": "Nalan's place was perfect for our stay in Kadikoy. It was very clean and in a great location. We will definitely stay here again for future trips."
            },
            {
                "_id": "361265420",
                "date": "2018-12-23T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "29093179",
                "reviewer_name": "Cenk",
                "comments": "Nalan hanimin evi tamda söylediği gibi kadikoy modanin merkezinde,temiz ve rahat bir ev. Kesinlikle tavsiye ederim."
            },
            {
                "_id": "400450718",
                "date": "2019-01-12T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "2782965",

                "comments": "Great location! Nalan was very responsive."
            },
            {
                "_id": "404452249",
                "date": "2019-01-24T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "28067269",
                "reviewer_name": "James",
                "comments": "Perfect in every way. A great apartment in a great area. I highly recommend Nalan’s place. It contains everything you need for a more than comfortable stay. She is also a first class host."
            },
            {
                "_id": "408329279",
                "date": "2019-02-04T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "23788201",
                "reviewer_id": "161321840",
                "reviewer_name": "Jarmo",
                "comments": "What is a typical Airbnb moment? Our stay at Nalan's apartment must be one of those special  moments. You arrive to a foreign land and city, where you never have been before. After an excruciating journey with an dishonest taxidriver from the wrong airport, you arrive at somebody else's home, and greeted with a warm welcome. After a short introduction where to sleep, and where to hang your your clothes, you are left alone in somebody else's nice and shiny clean apartment. Really a big wow type experience. And it is of course the very basic Airbnb, to tactfully and with great respect of other people's belongings stay in another person's apartment. What more is there to say? Of course the apartment was well cleaned, in very good condition, with all the necessary tings to cook, fry, iron, wash and so on.\nWe slept very well, and the whole area is full of shops, restaurants, bars and so on, all very closely together and in an small area easily reached by walking.\nTo visit Istanbul from Nalan's apartment is very simple,  you have the boats close by, going to most parts of the town. Going to Taksim square? Easy - take the boat to Kabatas, when there take the Metro one stop, and you are there. Grand Bazaar? Again easy, boat to Karaköy, cange to tram going over the bridge you just went under, get off at Beyazit stop. Get a Istanbul card, works at trams,  boats, metro and busses. Thank you Nalan for letting us use your apartment,  we had a wonderful stay, and we warmly recommend her apartment to anyone visiting Istanbul."
            }
        ]
    },

        "neighborhood_overview": "While Şişli (read as Sheshly) is often regarded as one of the upscale districts in Istanbul, there’s a lot more to it than just 5 star hotels and shopping malls. For a taste of Turkish culture, you can find impressive museums, churches and mosques all around this opulent district. Going to Şişli really is an experience of contemporary Turkish life.  You can see;  Atatürk Museum (Atatürk Müzesi), located on Halaskargazi Street, Atatürk Museum is a three story house museum painted in pink. Atatürk, the founder and the first President of the Republic of Turkey, first used the house for storage and residential purposes, but it was later changed to a museum to exhibit some of the personal belongings of Atatürk and depict his lifetime through historical documents and photographs. Since Atatürk did actually live and work in the house during significant historical events like the War of Independence and invasion of Istanbul, you will have a true experience of Atatürk’s life and Turkish history",
        "notes": "I have two cats  named Leo & Lisa. Leo is a 9 years old Siamese cat, I can tell that he is very friendly, he can come and sit on your lap after a few hours. Lisa is a 3 years old stray cat. She was in a very bad physical and psycological situation when I have adopted her from a vet. Now she is very happy and cool. You will not see her most of the time since she does not like to talk to the strangers :)",
        "transit": "ıf you come by plane to Istanbul Ataturk International airport (in the European sideof İstanbul) or Sabiha Gokcen Airport (in the Asian side of istanbul) the first thing you need to do is to get Turkish Liras – If you don’t have Turkish liras on you, use one of the many ATMs in the airport to withdraw some cash money. None of the transportation options mentioned below will accept credit cards, foreign currencies or big Turkish lira notes. Make sure you have some 5, 10, 20 or maximum 50 notes handy. Make sure that you write down or print out the address of my flat. Istanbul is a huge city. So, if you need help, just hand over the piece of paper. It’s not unusual for a taxi driver to ask for directions at traffic lights or call me. You can take Havabus. It is a municipality owned reliable airport shuttle service. You can find them outside the airport terminal, in the second lane. Every half hour, between 04:00 and 01:00, one of their buses heads for Taksim. The current pick-up and drop-o",
        "access": "you can use the kitchen, the bathroom, the living room and the entrance of the flat.",
        "interaction": "I will be pleased to help you about all the questions that you might ask about the city.",

We are also very close to the seaport where you can take a boat to the asian side of Istanbul by crossing the bosphorus in 30 min. Subway line (sishane stop) is only 10 min walking distance as well. We also have shuttles and buses traveling back and forth all day  which you can take it at the stop near our apartment.             {
                "_id": "1779220",
                "date": "2012-07-23T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "2671048",
                "reviewer_name": "Sabrina/Benedikt",
                "comments": "Olivia and Bob were lovely and thoughtful hosts, personable and generous. They received us with open arms, offered us a bottle of wine and provided all sorts of helpful information and precious recommendations. \r\n\r\nTheir apartment, located in the heart of Nolita, which is such a great area, is comfortable, clean, quiet at night and full of amenities that make it a great place to come home to after a long day in the city. \r\n\r\nThere are heaps of restaurants, shops and grocery stores within very close walking distance. A perfect home for anyone wishing to experience as much as possible of this great city within a limited time. \r\n\r\nWe spent a week at Olivia and Bob's place and would definitely love to be their guests again! "
            },
            {
                "_id": "1923781",
                "date": "2012-08-08T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "2574225",
                "reviewer_name": "Jacques",
                "comments": "Une excellente expérience: un bel appartement et une rencontre de qualité avec sa propriétaire."
            },
            {
                "_id": "2205579",
                "date": "2012-09-05T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "2436191",
                "reviewer_name": "Jer-Ming",
                "comments": "I rented Olivia and Bob's apartment for a couple of friends who were in town. While I did not stay in the apartment, I had a couple of opportunities to see the apartment and meet with Olivia. \r\n\r\nThe apartment is bright and spacious, and very tastefully furnished. And the location, the location.... can there be a better spot to be living in when visiting NYC? You're just steps away from everything and anything. \r\n\r\nOlivia is also a fantastic host. She's incredibly warm and friendly, and very accommodative in making arrangements. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "2237948",
                "date": "2012-09-09T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "2922751",
                "reviewer_name": "Jaga",
                "comments": "This is a great apartment in an absolutely perfect location! I stayed there for a week with a friend and we had a great experience. Bob and Olivia were warm and wonderful hosts who welcomed us into their apartment with a bottle of wine and personally hand-written notes, assuring us that everything had been arranged to ensure that we had a good stay. They were very friendly and helpful and gave us plenty of information/tips on NYC places of interest.\r\n"
            },
            {
                "_id": "2265809",
                "date": "2012-09-11T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3354466",
                "reviewer_name": "Zack",
                "comments": "Great and  apartment in a fantastic part of the city.  Even though Olivia and Bob were out of town, they made the logistics of getting the keys a synch.  Can't recommend this place enough. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "2338309",
                "date": "2012-09-18T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3476469",
                "reviewer_name": "Daniel",
                "comments": "Excellent apartment. The location is great, the owners are very nice people, the apartment is comfortable and the roof terrace is great."
            },
            {
                "_id": "2475243",
                "date": "2012-10-01T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3120907",
                "reviewer_name": "Laura",
                "comments": "Best location! The appartment is all renovated and comfy and so close to shops, bars and restaurants.. Great experience. Olivia and Bob were really nice and helpful. They gave me a special price on my second weekend with them. I highly recommend their place for a NY stay."
            },
            {
                "_id": "2539304",
                "date": "2012-10-08T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "519161",
                "reviewer_name": "Ann",
                "comments": "The apartment was charming, spotless, and very spacious. The location is ideal, and Olivia and Olivia and Bob attend to even the smallest details. I will always try to stay there when I come to the city."
            },
            {
                "_id": "2616549",
                "date": "2012-10-15T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3085392",
                "reviewer_name": "Luis",
                "comments": "The apartment is located in the heart of Nolita, with a lot of restaurants, bars and nice shops around. It's clean, well-decrated, comfortable and close to Prince St subway station.\r\nFinally Olivia is a nive hostess worth having a conversation with."
            },
            {
                "_id": "2682256",
                "date": "2012-10-22T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3085392",
                "reviewer_name": "Luis",
                "comments": "We spent two consecutive weekends in Olivia/Bob's home and it was perfect. Located in the middle of Nolita and with a lot of litlle shops and restaurants around i can say that it probably was the best of my many trips to NYC. Definitely a good choice to stay!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "2749305",
                "date": "2012-10-29T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3727767",
                "reviewer_name": "Jeremiah",
                "comments": "Olivia and Bob were incredibly gracious hosts. They apartment was just as described and quite lovely. It was very clean and in a great part of town surrounded by lots of shopping and restaurants. There were thorough instructions provided and helpful tips on things to see and do. We could not have been happier with the place and the location and hope to return many times to their place."
            },
            {
                "_id": "2920334",
                "date": "2012-11-19T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3679916",
                "reviewer_name": "Andrea",
                "comments": "Staying at Olivia and Bob's place was awesome! This is now the place I want to be in NY! As hosts they did everything to make us feel home, great welcome gift and super easy way to get the keys. The neighborhood is one of my favorite and especially where the apartment is located. The apt is very quiet extremely comfortable and very big too...the rooftop is the cherry on the cake!\r\nThank you Olivia and Bob!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "2979443",
                "date": "2012-11-27T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3157178",
                "reviewer_name": "Tine",
                "comments": "We spend 5 days in NYC at thanksgiving in Olivias apartment and had the best time. The location were just perfect for our needs - close to the subway, close to the shops in Soho and a great neighbourhood. The apartment itself had everything we needed - it is very spacious, clean, quiet at night and the roof terrace were an added bonus! Olivia was very responsive and helpful in our communication throughout the whole time and we felt very safe dealing with her. The notes in the apartment were very helpful and had a lot great tips. We would definitely recommend this place to everyone."
            },
            {
                "_id": "3001315",
                "date": "2012-12-01T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3943576",
                "reviewer_name": "Lachlan",
                "comments": "We absolutely loved our time at the apartment. The location was ideal, immersed by shops, bars and restaurants and easy access to transport. Staying in the apartment allowed us to feel like locals for four days, much better than staying in a chain hotel! \r\n'The apartment itself was clean and spacious, the comprehensive notes left for the apartment and neighbourhood ensured no detail was left behind. Although we did not meet Olivia & Bob, their neighbour was there to greet us, and made us feel welcome. "
            },
            {
                "_id": "3177602",
                "date": "2012-12-29T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3952001",
                "reviewer_name": "Eloise",
                "comments": "My parents and I spent a week in Olivia and Bob's apartment, we had a wonderful time. The flat is very well located in a nice neighborhood, close to subways and interesting touristic sites. The apartment is very clean, very comfortable, and Oliva and Bob are great host, very welcoming!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "3237222",
                "date": "2013-01-03T05:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "1921249",
                "reviewer_name": "Florencia",
                "comments": "We stayed at Olivia and Bob apartment, Olivia gave us a very friendly wellcome. The apartmente is very well located in a beatifull neirbourghood like Nolita, near a lot of subway lines and there connection. \r\nThe aparment is verry charmy, spacious, we got a great time in here, and Olivia and Bob are great host.\r\nWe recomend it!!!!"
            },
            {
                "_id": "4372633",
                "date": "2013-05-01T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "4008454",
                "reviewer_name": "Andrea",
                "comments": "We´ve spent 10 perfect nights on Olivia and Bob´s apartment. They were waiting for us the day of our arrival with delicious chocolate chip cookies and a bottle of sparkling wine. They also came to say goodbye the day we leave. \r\nThe apartment is very nice, just as it looks on the pictures, very clean, and it has everything you would need for a comfortable stay. The neighborhood is charming, full of little restaurants, bars and shops, but not noisy. It is close to many subway stations so as to go everywhere you want without even changing trains. \r\nOlivia and Bob are wonderful people and great hosts. We strongly recommend the place and are looking forward to return someday."
            },
            {
                "_id": "4542857",
                "date": "2013-05-12T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "4351027",
                "reviewer_name": "Cécile",
                "comments": "Nous avons séjourné 9 nuits dans l'appartement de Olivia et Bob. Nous y avons passé un très agréable moment. L'appartement est exactement comme l'annonce le décrit. Il est situé dans un petit quartier très sympa, Nolita, entre Soho, Chinatown et Little Italy. Un bon point de départ pour visiter la ville. De plus Olivia et Bob sont des personnes vraiment sympathiques et toujours prêtes à nous aider et nous informer. \r\nBref, une très bonne expérience à New York! "
            },
            {
                "_id": "4644246",
                "date": "2013-05-18T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "929824",
                "reviewer_name": "Hannah",
                "comments": "We loved staying at Olivia and Bob's apartment on Prince St, the perfect location for us to explore the city again and the perfect hosts!\r\n\r\nOlivia was there to greet us on arrival and showed us around her lovely apartment.\r\n\r\nWe even managed to get up to the roof terrace when the sun was shining for an alfresco drink- what views!\r\n\r\nWould recommend and definitely return!\r\n"
            },
            {
                "_id": "4725375",
                "date": "2013-05-22T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "4874393",
                "reviewer_name": "Alex",
                "comments": "This apartment was perfect.  Very spacious, airy, comfortable and the location for us was perfect.  300 feet from my niece's apartment, in a vibrant, interesting neighborhood, and close to the subway.  Olivia was charming, punctual, and contientious.  Would highly recommend this location to anyone - and the rooftop deck was an added bonus.  Great place for your morning coffee or a late night glass of wine."
            },
            {

                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "3104870",
                "reviewer_name": "Dorthe",
                "comments": "We (three people) stayed in Olivia and Bobs apartment for a week in May, and it was perfect! \r\n\r\nBefore we left Denmark, Olivia was very helpful finding the best transportation from Newark Airport. It’s exactly like Olivia and Bob describe. The rooftop is amazing – breathtaking day and night! \r\n\r\nWe met Olivia and Bob just before we left NYC and they are really kind and helpful. We provide the best recommendation! \r\n"
            },

                "reviewer_name": "Leora",
                "comments": "The apartment is very clean, spacious and quiet. Olivia and Bob met us and showed us around in a very friendly manner. The location is excellent-  close to subway stations and in the centre of a lively, vibrant area filled with restaurants, shops yet it is quiet. Food shopping is easy as it is close to Wholefoods and Dean and Deluca. The only thing we would have preferred would have been a slightly larger bed .                 "reviewer_id": "7066341",
                "reviewer_name": "Naomi",
                "comments": "This apartment was fantastic for us!  Olivia and Bob were wonderful hosts, showing us where things were and how to use them. They provided us with maps and guidebooks of the city, and a detailed list of recommended restaurants, grocery stores, and laundry services in the neighborhood.\r\nThere were 2 in our party. We each took a bedroom; both complete with comfy bed and clean sheets. The recently renovated bathroom was beautifully done and had good water pressure, plenty of hot water, and fresh towels. Although we ate most of our meals out, we enjoyed using the well-appointed kitchen for snacks, breakfast and drinks. The rooftop terrace has fabulous views of the city, a perfect place for sipping morning coffee or evening cocktail. \r\nWe found the neighborhood charming with many restaurants, cafes, shops, and grocery stores within a few blocks radius. Yet, the apartment is conveniently located close to several subway and bus lines making it super easy to explore the rest of town. Little Italy; Chinatown; the Tenement Museum; and Dean and DeLuca are all within a few blocks of home base.  \r\nConsidering all of the activity in the surrounding neighborhood, the street and apartment were very quiet.\r\nWe unequivocally recommend this apartment and will wish to stay here on future visits to NYC!\r\n \r\n"

                "comments": "The apartment is really nice. One feels like at home directly. The rooftop terrace  for breakfast is the best feature. There is a wonderful view over New York. "

                "comments": "Living in Nolita we experienced the real New York City neighbourhood atmosphere.                 "reviewer_id": "6825798",
                "reviewer_name": "Julia",
                "comments": "My mum and I had a wonderful 9 night stay at Olivia and Bobs apartment in Nolita NYC. From the apartment itself which is spacious,  comfortable and has a rooftop with great views of the city to the location which in my opinion is unbeatable. If I was to move to NYC this is the neighbourhood I would be moving to with all the restaurants and shopping  available plus multiple subway lines enabling quick and easy transport around manhattan and beyond.
