            {
                "_id": "34689336",
                "date": "2015-06-11T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "17111932",
                "reviewer_name": "R J P",
                "comments": "From the moment we saw the listing we had a greta feeling that this would provide us with the unique New York city living experience.  Olivia and Bob were very communicative prior to and during our trip and their welcome could not have been  better, particularly after a long day of travel.  The bottle of welcoming prosecco was a great touch of kindness.  Both Olivia and Bob explained many features of their lovely cosy home and the surrounding area.\r\nThe apartment is very roomy and cosy and we thought it looked much bigger \"in the flesh\" compared with the photographs.\r\nThe bedrooms are a perfect size, the bathroom modern and the kitchen is fully equipped.  We stayed for 10 days so some nights, when we just wanted to chill out, the kitchen facilities came in really handy and with a supermarket very close by we really did feel home from home.\r\nThe area where the apartment is is great. There are so many restaurants, shops, bars and is less high rise than most tourist parts of New York so it really feels village-like, adding to what was just a brilliant experience.\r\nOlivia and Bob are very knowledgeable about the area and their contact details were on hand 24/7 if we had any questions.  Luckily Ive been to New York a few times but there's always more you can learn and the welcome pack that Olivia/Bob provide is very useful for first timers and the more experienced NYC tourist.\r\n\r\nOverall an exceptionally magnificent and true NYC experience! Thank you Olivia and Bob."
            },
            {
                "_id": "37828063",
                "date": "2015-07-11T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "55097",
                "reviewer_name": "Karen",
                "comments": "Olivia and Bob are warm, friendly and very helpful hosts. Their apartment is spectacular - spacious, beautifully decorated with every amenity  for a perfect holiday . It is also the quietest place l have  stayed in in NYC.\r\nThe bedrooms are comfortable with plenty of closet space  and opening windows.\r\nThe kitchen is clean, serviceable and has everything you need for self catering.\r\n\r\nThe immediate neighborhood is lovely. Well off the tourist trail it is packed full of interesting boutiques,galleries and lovely restaurants and bars. Olivia and Bob provided great recommendations which we followed up on and were delighted with our experiences.\r\n\r\nLots of information was provided on arrival and we were encouraged to contact the hosts with any further questions. Its a big city with a lot to see so the maps, timetables and guide books provided saved us a lot of time.\r\n\r\nThe roof top garden is a big bonus - the views are breathtaking and it was a lovely place to sit in the evenings.\r\n\r\nTo conclude : If you are considering a homestay in Manhattan - look no further - you have just found the best. We look forward to our next trip\r\n"
            },

                "reviewer_name": "Marcela",
                "comments": "We have spent 3 wonderful weeks in NYC.\r\nThe aparment is accurate as can be seen in the pictures.\r\nOur hosts were very friendly and concerned about our needs.\r\nI recommend this accommodation to my friends.\r\nThanks Olivia and Bob !"

            {
                "_id": "43347694",
                "date": "2015-08-19T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "25186986",
                "reviewer_name": "Uta",
                "comments": "Liebe Olivia, lieber Bob\r\nWir hatten eine aufregende und wunderbare Woche in New York und haben schon furchtbar Heimweh nach Big Apple.  Mit Euch und eurem Appartement hätten wir es nicht besser treffen können. Es war für unsere Bedürfnisse (Tante und Teenie-Neffe) absolut perfekt.\r\nWir haben uns wie Freunde willkommen gefühlt.  Die Freundlichkeit, die ihr ausstrahlt, ist wunderbar. Allein die vielen Tipps im Voraus und die e-mails haben uns so viel weiter geholfen.  Das Infomaterial von Euch für die nähere Umgebung waren sehr hilfreich. Außerdem sind die vielen kleinen Hinweise in der Wohnung super praktisch.\r\nUnd wie gut hat es getan am Abend \"nach Hause\" in ein wunderbar ruhiges und heimeliges Appartement zurückzukehren.  Die Beschreibung der Wohnung war absolut treffend und alles hat perfekt funktioniert. Ein besonderes Highlight ist natürlich der Roof-Garden mit spektakulärem Blick - besonders am Abend.  Die Lage ist perfekt mit vielen kleinen Restaurants, Shops und die Metro um die Ecke  --  und dennoch leise.\r\nIch bin voller Dankbarkeit, dass unsere Woche gerade auch wegen der Unterkunft  ein so intensives und angenehmes Erlebnis war.\r\nAlles Gute für Euch - und wenn wir wieder kommen dann nur zu Euch."
            },

                "comments": "A lovely & spacious apartment in a great location. We spent a long weekend in May.  Lots of Windows, a full kitchen, comfortable beds.             {
                "_id": "83636685",
                "date": "2016-07-03T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "533168",
                "reviewer_id": "61293496",
                "reviewer_name": "John",
                "comments": "This is a nice 2 bdrm, 1 bath apt in a great location for anyone looking for lower East Village/ SOHO/ Little Italy area with good restaurants and shops, near NYU or just being close to good subway stops that can then get you quickly to pretty much anywhere else in the city. Is already a great street that seems to be getting even better with still more shops and restaurants nearby that go late into the evening.\r\n\r\nApt spacious for NYC standards, quiet - as in no street noise – with washer/dryer in basement of elevator building. Has window AC units for warm summer days. Overall, nothing particularly fancy, but good. And was clean. Can also go up to roof for great view of city skyline or just to chill out. \r\n\r\nWas very busy during my time there, so made minimal use of kitchen, but it has gas range, fridge, dishwasher – everything needed to settle in or just prepare quick meals and snacks. Wireless Internet, too. Everything provided for bath and kitchen. Rented for about a month and apartment worked well. Understand they are changing some lighting, which will brighten up the living area. \r\n\r\nUnit definitely reflects its owners, right down to the multi-page apartment guide and its do's and don’ts. They are very invested in the unit and everything in it and how it will be used. My first time to use Airbnb, so having the owners that involved was a little unlike other experiences where have rented for weeks and months at a time elsewhere in the US and Europe. They, too, may still be getting used to the idea of renting out their apartment, and how to furnish it and let go to reduce their anxiety. \r\n\r\n"
            },

                "comments": "Olivia and Bob are the perfect hosts.  You feel immediately welcomed by them.  The nice flowers in charming little glasses across the flat made it extra especial as well as a delicious bottle of Proseco that they left in the fridge for us. We also found on the table in the living room various maps and information about New York which were very helpful. Olivia would often send me emails with information about nice events happening in Manhattan during our stay, including the unique \"Manhattanhenge\" solstice day - when the setting sun aligns perfectly with the grid.\r\nThe flat is beautiful.  I loved the warm colors and the great artwork with pieces collected from all over the world.  Bedrooms and beds are comfortable and all appliances in the flat are easy to use.  The location could not be better for us.  Lots of great restaurants, boutiques and interesting shops.                 "comments": "Tout était exceptionnel ! Déjà avant le séjour, nombreux contacts afin de nous aider à préparer le voyage. L’appartement est spacieux, joliment décoré, on s’y sent immédiatement chez soi. C’est un appartement dans lequel les hôtes vivent réellement (de loin pas systématique avec Airbnb), et donc il est parfaitement équipé et fonctionnel (salle de bain, cuisine,...).                 "reviewer_id": "12713015",
                "reviewer_name": "Chantelle",
                "comments": "Two of us stayed at Olivia and Bob's place for over 2 weeks in October.  Bob and Olivia met us and provided keys and a tour of the apartment on arrival. The lift access to the apartment was a godsend at the end of a day touring New York.  The view from the rooftop is amazing and the photos do not do this justice.\n\nThe location of this apartment is fantastic, close to multiple train lines in the heart of Nolita.  There are restaurants, bars, shops, coffee shops and Wholefoods just around the corner. A 20 minute walk to Union Square to the green market and 5 minutes from Broadway.  The location is perfect for those that want to experience New York out of mid town and feel more a part of day to day New York.\nBoth of us had been to New York a number of times before, so did not need much assistance from Olivia.                 "_id": "29353934",
                "date": "2015-04-06T04:00:00.000Z",
                "listing_id": "5482864",
                "reviewer_id": "15223783",
                "reviewer_name": "Sonia & Ricardo",
                "comments": "This place is as beautiful as it looks in the pictures. It is clean, tidy, well-decorated and makes you feel like home. The living room is nice and bright in the day and if you need a break from drinking in the bars and pubs at night (which are within walking distance by the way), the balcony is a nice place to relax too. Lucile has been super helpful and friendly in providing us with all the necessary details required for our stay. If there is one thing you need to know about this place, it is that the beds are really comfy! It's like sleeping in your favorite clean, old t-shirt. Be careful, you might find it hard to peel yourselves off the bed in the mornings. Thank you once again for sharing your beautiful home with us!"
            },

                "comments": "Darling point e' la posizione giusta x un week end rilassante a Sidney ed e' la location per famiglie che si vogliono godere il clima estivo e la tranquillita' della baia.\nLa casa di Carl e' molto accogliente, Carl e' stato sempre molto attento , provido di informazioni  e suggerimenti. \nRitornerei subito ad abitare  in Casa di Carl ciamo trovati molto molto bene !!\nGrazie a Carl.\n________________________________________________\nDarling point is a great location if you are looking for  relaxing time in Sydney also it is the perfect location for families who want to enjoy the summer weather and the tranquility of the Bay with a great park where you can play make joging.\nCarl's House is perfect , Carl was always attentive, providing a lot  of information and tips.\nI would like to go back to sidney in carl's  house  to live.\nWe feell at home we feel very very well!!\nThanks to Carl."

                "reviewer_id": "39688147",
                "reviewer_name": "Helen",
                "comments": "We spent a lovely week at Micheline's beautiful apartment in one of Montreal's most engaging neighborhoods. The apartment was bright and spacious, and equipped with everything we needed. The bed was very comfortable and we slept soundly. I would have thought there would be more street noise right in town but it really was not noticeable.\n\nThe location was perfect - since the weather was fine we lingered often in the Square St Louis. The cafe on the square not only is convenient - it has the best coffee we've had in a long time and delicious sandwiches. Many many other restaurants were just a short walk. We also used the Bixi bike rental stand on the square to borrow bikes for an outing to nearby Parc la Fontaine, which is also within walking distance if you prefer not to bike.\n\nMicheline was easily reached by phone and text. I would definitely stay here again."
            },
